text:
When I use Junit4 (testcases with annotations and a JUnit4TestCaseAdapter), the
report presents something like this...

Testsuite: br.com.mapaestrutural.test.io.Grid2DIOTest
Tests run: 3, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Time elapsed: 0,328 sec

Testcase: unknown took 0 sec
Testcase: unknown took 0,265 sec
Testcase: unknown took 0,047 sec
creator: matheus.cabral@gmail.com

text:
Matheus, some checks:

What's your java version?
Do your testcases extend JUnit's TestCase?

(asking you because it works for me)

Regards, Jan
creator: j_cumps@yahoo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
you don't need an explicit JUnit4TestCaseAdapter in Ant 1.7.x.

Matheus, can you provide an example test?  It seems to work for many people, myself included.
please reopen when more information is available
creator: bodewig@apache.org
